608980.name: Arch Virtual HQ
608980.description:
You're invited to visit Arch Virtual HQ! After exploring our virtual office, choose from a variety of destinations to visit, including a residential condominium architectural visualization, an operating room with a 3D scanned patient for medical simulation, and an interactive oil rig.

This demo of our services also features our multi-player system, Immerse Collaborative. to meet with one of our representatives to discuss a potential project, please sign up at the demo website.

Use passcode '1216' to join multi-player.
608980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
